title: Ep. #24 | CLC, BOL4, and 2LSON
description:
Welcome back to another episode! We cover CLC’s “DEVIL,” BOL4’s “WORKAHOLIC,” and 2LSON’s “A SONG WITHOUT YOU (FT. ERIC NAM)”.

This week’s crazy ramblings: Eric talks about a sad middle school moment, finding work-life balance in his job, and his love for fat Pikachu. Listen until the end for spoilers on Eric’s upcoming plans!

If you enjoyed this episode, be sure to subscribe (FOR FREE) and let us know your thoughts by leaving a comment, rating, and/or review on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, SoundCloud, and Youtube. 

Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and www.divestudios.io/show/daebakshow/ !

#clc #devil #bol4 #workaholic #2lson #asongwithoutyou #ericnam #daebakshow
 
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
